IssuesNotes: UPSID, WALS, and OLAC all cite Phillips1976; OLAC lists two codes for this resource: wgi:"waghi" and whg:"Wahgi, North"  (also possible is nii:"Nii" in the Waghi subfamily; see PDF online at http://www.sil.org/pacific/png/abstract.asp?id=12435).  See library search sheet for the Phillips 1976 resource.
ResolutionNotes: checked original source.  correct code is WGI.  2010-11-05, DRM & RW

UPSID and WALS both cite Hyman1973, which OLAC says is about xpe:"liberian kpelle" (not gkp:"guinea kpelle" or knu:"kono").  See http://wals.info/refdb/record/Hyman-1973 and http://olac.ldc.upenn.edu/item/oai:refdb.wals.info:390

UPSID, WALS, and OLAC all cite Abdalla 1973 for code xtc:"Katcha-Kadugli-Miri" (not other of the Kadugli-Krongo languages).  See resource on "library search" sheet. http://www.language-archives.org/item/oai:refdb.wals.info:2
